definitions.title: n. [m.]
definitions.body: either back (Targum [[גַּב]] back, top; BH [[גַּב]], √ [[גנב]]), or < side (√ [[גנב]], cf. Ar. janbun side, Syr. gabo0 side, √ gnb;—v. also D:WB 65);—pl. sf. Da 7:6 Kt wings [[עַל־גַּבַּיהּ]] on its sides (Bev Behrm Dr; Qr [[גַּבַּהּ]] perh. its back, so most).
